column4: well in my previous exp with Linux and ATI i had a mother of a problem getting OpenGL to work properly playing Unreal Tournament. MESA was used instead of OGL
i`m using the AMD64 5.10 Live CD of Ubuntu at this time. I am seriously considering changing to a FULL install. What other stuff/problems can i expect with 64bit OS ?
some apps wont run on 64bit  i would install the 32bit on your system
yes thats what server install is for
